attributes.additional_details: My daughter has severe air-borne, touch-sensitive allergies to both peanuts and tree nuts. She has never been able to travel abroad because airlines won’t offer an alternative snack to nuts.
attributes.background: Ban nuts on all flights so that nut allergy sufferers can travel without risking death.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. At the moment, this is a decision for airlines. The UK Government and Parliament don't have the power to force airlines to take this action.

You could start a new petition asking the UK Government to urge airlines to remove nuts and nut-based products from planes, if that's what you want to happen.

In the meantime, you might be interested in this petition: 

Appoint an Allergy Tsar as a champion for people living with allergies
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/589716
